The tail of scorponok was to fast for Remus in this form, he wanted to
avoi=
d close combat but staying in this hover mode will diavantaged him
a lot mo=
re. The shock of the tail pushed him on a wall him. As he get
up on his fee=
t again, he transform to his bot form. He was taller than
 scorponok and hi=
s tail was quick : he had to watch out. Has he was
thinking about his next =
move. Jotunn landed near them and Zarak came
out of Scorponok : This figth =
was starting to look very bad. The two
shot were the diversion Remsu needed=
: he took out the small blade
underhis wings, then he rushed on Scorponok t=
rying to hit the tail
leaving the other blade to block a possible counter s=
hot.

MEANWHILE

Motherload was coming rigth at Grimlock. He didn't made a =
move to
avoid the hit, instead he bitted the punch an block with his hand. =
The
 hit was strong and Grimlock slide backward without loosing any of his
=
stability. While motherload was still in his range, Grimlock turn
around to=

Grimlock : Grimlock have fun. Grimlock not figth=
 long time.

MEANWHILE

gain. Grimlock was
fithging motherload, Deadfur had taken great preparation=

of preds. Remus was still untacable and Jotunn neither.

RAz=
orwing opened a comlink : Remus? Remus what is yours status?

heard) I'm trying to ho=

may...... scrchhhh

n i'll
leave you in charge of this front, give me all devellopement here...=
.
Remus i'm coming.  Razorwing transform! 

Razorwing transformed and flew =
out to find Remus and Jotunn.
